explains: adj. 地下的；秘密的；隐蔽的

sentences.en: The city has 9 miles of such subterranean passages.
sentences.cn: 这座城市有9英里这样的地下通道。

sentences.en: Tom found a subterranean lake, shortly, which stretched its dim length away until its shape was lost in the shadows.
sentences.cn: 不久，汤姆发现了一个地下湖，它渐渐伸展，直到在黑暗中渐渐消失了。

sentences.en: Empty paddle boats await rowers at the main cave entrance at Puerto Princesa Subterranean River National Park in the Philippines.
sentences.cn: 菲律宾的公主港地下河国家公园的主洞入口处，停靠着几只空空的桨船，在等待桨手的到来。
